item.title: Hello World
item.description: Writing this from a coffee shop in the heart of Manhattan, far from home. Hopefully this website will last longer than my last one, running a webserver from a Raspberry Pi in your closet may be worth the geek cred as long as you let a certain monolithic corporation manage your DNS entries automagically, but once you’ve migrated to a different provider, playing Whack-A-Mole with dynamic DNS entries isn’t worth it.
